en.description: Adaptation is an Warframe mod that grants damage resistance to the last damage type received to the player by 10% for 20s. This effect can stack up to 90% resistance.

ru.description: Adaptation is an Warframe mod that grants damage resistance to the last damage type received to the player by 10% for 20s. This effect can stack up to 90% resistance.

ko.description: Adaptation is an Warframe mod that grants damage resistance to the last damage type received to the player by 10% for 20s. This effect can stack up to 90% resistance.
